Token.Abstract: The base class for listener action implementations that can be directly executed.
Implemented by subclasses to perform the action when an event is received.

Parameter.Name: event
Parameter.Abstract: the NSNotification that triggered the event listener. This parameter may be nil if the action is not being executed as the result of an event trigger (in other words, when the listener action is being invoked manually).

Token.Abstract: Allows manual execution of the action, without being triggered by an event.
Attempts to validate the receiver's data model and, if successful, executes the event using the passed-in notification.

Parameter.Name: event
Parameter.Abstract: the NSNotification that triggered the event listener. This parameter may be nil if the action is not being executed as the result of an event trigger (in other words, when the listener action is being invoked manually).
